data.actual_result: Emotes use the same size as before the display size change
data.expected_result: Emotes should scale correctly after changing display size
data.short_description: Emotes appear in wrong size after changing display size (Android 7+ only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure discord is open in the background - Go to settings and change display size (bigger change is more noticable) - Go back to discord - Look at an emote
